name: Cave Breaker
description:
A puzzle maze game

Walk, push and slide your way through 150 puzzles and stages!

150 stages to complete!

Complete unlocked stages in the order of your choice!

Level skip through stages you've beaten!

Simple to learn puzzle mechanics that get harder and harder!

Controls:

Up / W: move up

Left / A: move left

Down / S: move down

Right / D: move right

Esc: exit room

Space / R: restart room

Shift / F: Fullscreen

Enter: confirm selection
